title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Policy 8 - Registration of Domestic Representative Offices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Policy 8 - Registration of Domestic Representative Offices

State Regulations
§ 8.1 - General, version 3
§ 8.2 - Definitions, version 3
§ 8.3 - Information required, version 2
§ 8.4 - Permissible activities, version 2
§ 8.5 - Designation as representative office, version 2

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Policy 8

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 14[1], 132, 258

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
